The claim was published on a website kno: org, which is a part of the "America's Last Line of Defense" network of junk news websites.
The article in question titled: BREAKING: Trump Invokes 25th Amendment to Expel Nancy Pelosi for Mental Health Reasons" was identified as satire and categorized as "Pelosi satire so rubes have a woman to hate."
The 25th Amendment: which was claimed to have been invoked, actually governs issues related to the removal and replacement of the President and Vice President of the United States, not members of Congress such as the Speaker of the House.
The author of the article: Dan Evon, is a former writer for Snopes, a fact-checking website.
